title: [SOLVED] Star Guardian Borders
body: How long do I have to purchase the skins with the borders? 50 dollars wasn't enough, and because of Hurricane Irma, I'm going to need to wait a week. When does it expire? Please tell me!

replies.body: Those bundles will be fading away on 9/25, so you should be alright if you only need to wait a week.
OH MAIII GAWD. THANK YOU, THANK YOU RIOT, THANK YOU JESUS, THANK YOU BUDDHA THANK YOU IRMA
